attributes.action: End all tax relief for multiple buy-to-let property owners
attributes.additional_details:
Disincentivise multiple buy-to-let by removing all tax relief for landlords.
It is simply unfair that a generation is putting £hundreds per month into their landlords mortgage, instead of towards their own because they have been priced out of the market due to lack of supply, or cant afford to save for a deposit due to excessive rental prices.
